title: Warden of Vitality
content:
Gate 3

Warden of Vitality can be acquired by the following classes:

Paladin Oath of the Crown Bard using Magical Secrets lvl 10, (level 6 with Lore subclass)

Warden of Vitality can be cast by using the following Items:

Warden of Vitality Tips & Notes in BG3

Notes & Tips go here

Lvl 3 Spells Animate Dead ♦ Beacon of Hope ♦ Bestow curse ♦ Blinding Smite ♦ Blink ♦ Call Lightning ♦ Celestial Haste ♦ Conjure Barrage ♦ Counterspell ♦ Crusader's Mantle ♦ Daylight ♦ Elemental Weapon ♦ Fear ♦ Feig
